task.title: Changing a keystore's password
task.shortdesc: The Signing and Keys view enables you to change the password used to protect a keystore.

step.cmd: If necessary, open the Signing and Keys view by selecting Window Show View Other and then selecting MOTODEV Studio Signing and Keys from the list of views. Note that this view is part of the MOTODEV Studio for Android perspective and is thus normally opened when you switch to that perspective.
From the list of keystores displayed in the Signing and Keys view, select the keystore for which you want to change the password.
Click (Change Keystore Password) in the Signing and Keys toolbar.
step.stepresult: The Enter Password dialog is displayed.

step.cmd: If necessary, supply the keystore's password in the Old password field provided. Note that if you previously indicated that MOTODEV Studio should save this keystore's password, that password is automatically filled in for you.
Enter the new password to be used to protect the keystore into the New password and Confirm new password fields.
If you would like MOTODEV Studio to save this keystore's password and then automatically fill it in when it is called for in the various Signing and Keys dialogs, select Save this password.
